distributed_by: 20th Century Fox Distribution (Australia) Fox Searchlight Pictures (USA)
DVD release: The film was released on home video on 27 February 2001 by Fox Home Entertainment.
Soundtrack: The Bootmen Soundtrack was released by RCA Victor in 2000 and composed by Cezary Skubiszewski and other various artists.
Box office: Bootmen grossed $2,720,302 at the box office in Australia.[1]
starring: Adam Garcia Sophie Lee Sam Worthington
written_by: Steve Worland Hilary Linstead Dein Perry
